title: The £18 vegan 'super cream' that promises to reduce your wrinkles - but does it work?
text:
Touted as the best thing you can do for the environment, the number of vegans in the UK rose from 150,000 in 2006 to 540,000 by 2016. And with an endless list of youthful looking celebrities such as Jessica Chastain, Natalie Portman, Beyonce, Michelle Pfeiffer and Giselle raving about the beauty benefits of a plant based diet, it’s no surprise the numbers are growing by the day. Pfeiffer, 61, claims its helped her ‘age gracefully,' while Chastain believes going vegan is the secret to her clearer skin.

But, while eating plants might be great for your complexion, you can cheat your way to glowing ‘vegan skin’ by adding products that are devoid of animal derived ingredients into your beauty arsenal. ...
